metadata.title: CVE-2017-11215 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Adobe Flash Player 27.0.0.183 and earlierversions. This vulnerability is an instance of a use after freevulnerability in the Primetime SDK. The mismatch between an old and a newobject can provide an attacker with unintended memory access -- potentiallyleading to code corruption, control-flow hijack, or an information leakattack. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 27.0.0.187ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 27.0.0.187ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '27.0.0.187ubuntu0.16.04.1').
